These are the four demon-kings who guard the four quarters of the universe; they were introduced from Ceylon into China only c. 733 by Pu-k’ ung (V III-1) and are now to be seen in the entrance hall, t ’ien-wang t ’ang (or tien), of every Buddhist temple
